title: Deck of enchantments
data:
{{Obsolete}}

The '''deck of enchantments''' is an [[Decks#Archetype_decks|archetype deck]] that is not found as an independent item in the game.  It is used in the construction of the [[Decks#Composition|physical decks]], as listed in [[Decks#Deck_components|this table]].

==History==
The deck of enchantments was removed in [[0.15]], its single card being moved to the [[deck of emergency]].
